column2:
"So the origin of the problem lies
within this flower... \"Ephimera\"."
"Have you heard about the potency of this flower?"
"Using it as a magical catalyst drastically improves the magical effect..."

"Yes, indeed. Especially if used to
perform magic that was regarded as
impossible for normal people."
"It's a mysterious and peculiar flower that disappears like a mist when its petals fall off, and blooms unexpectedly without ever producing seeds."
"It was also described as a gift from God... But of course, it's the opposite."
"It's a magical flower that slowly consumes the soul of its user upon each use and alters the world. It's more akin to a contract with a demon."

"Consumes the soul...?
What does that even mean?"
"I've already explained it, fairy. If you use the Mana that Ephimera uses, your soul will be consumed over time."
"If you use magic while using Ephimera, it will unconsciously progress... to a point where the distinction between reality and fantasy is lost. Total insanity."
"It only allows for itself. It will make you incapable of thinking about others."
"Lutz also became insane... He killed the king and took over the throne. And so, here we are."
"This is just like a Darker infection..."
"However, it's starting to sound like the origin of Ephimera is the [Profound Darkness]."
"If you continue to use Ephimera, your soul is consumed... If that's the case, then it's definitely a threat."
"But how did you figure this out?"
"That's..."
"I was the person responsible for creating the magic that summons a Devil Castle. I've killed many who've gone insane from it."
"No, that was different! My brother only did it for the development of magic...!"
"It's alright, Harriet."
"We sacrificed many in the pursuit of research and development. It was my sin, and it was what cost me the throne."
"And because of me, the world is being consumed by my research. That is a fact."
"1. Why did you do this?"
"2. Did it not go according to plan?"
"Would you trust me if I said it was for advancing the world...?"
"It was a subject for studying. Isn't that alone enough of a reason to continue the research?"
"If it did, you think I would be in this place?"
"This is the result of sticking to my research and not looking at others."
"As people's souls were being consumed, I only sat there and watched."
"Had Harriet not been there, I would have ended up the same as Lutz..."
"It's true, my brother created the Devil Castles..."
"But it was also my brother, Luther, who created the summoning technique, \"Buster Tower\" that is used to destroy the castles."
"However, it's because of this research that Lutz set out to have us killed."

"Starting with the sharing of the
Devil Castle technology to other
nations, spreading lies and rumors,
and research that further ruins this
nation; I wonder how many false
charges he's gotten lined up now?"
"Ephimera was discovered decades before we were born."
"Although its effect was huge, it wasn't enough to change the world."
"However, the new summoning method that my brother, Luther, discovered, the Devil Castles, changed the way war was fought in this world."
"Each nation has summoned a Devil Castle along their borders and created a situation where no one can attack, only keep on posturing."
"We cannot attack, but the battle will not spread; No unneeded bloodshed either. It almost makes the world peaceful."
"I guess you could say that the widespread knowledge on Devil Castles hasn't gone in vain."
"However, this is only the first step towards global destruction."
"Because Ephimera will drive people insane?"
"Yes, we must destroy all of the Devil Castles, as they consume and spread Ephimera."
"For that reason, I created the Buster Towers as a way to break through the Devil Castle's Devil Barrier."
"Of course, just using it requires a ton of Mana. Of course, without Ephimera..."
"It's not something an ordinary person can utilize. It was impossible for Harriet and I as well."
"However, you seem to have mastered it and mastered destroying the Devil Barriers and Devil Castle as well."
"In addition, you've analyzed a Buster Tower with your own technology and even replicated it. Several, even."
"What can we call you, if not saviors?"

"Blooming without any explanation,
becoming a catalyst without any
reason. Such fantasy doesn't exist..."
"That flower corrupts the world each time it's used, that existence that drives the world mad. We must destroy it as soon as possible."
"Luther..."
